name: Venomous Vault Guardian
description:
For generations, your family has controlled the poison factory in Mount Evil, where you supply villains and rogues around the world with only the deadliest of toxins.

And yet, for some reason, you're constantly attacked by heroes. What gives? Fortunately, the monsters who spawn in Mount Evil are always happy to defend your property.

Goal

Gather monsters to defend against raids. Touch monsters to make them follow you, and bring them to the Gates of Evil to send them off.

Each Gate of Evil has a request box, which tells you what monsters are needed to defend. You can always bring extra monsters on top of the requirements.

If you don't bring the right monsters, your poison factory loses some productivity. Do that 12 times and it's game over.

Controls

Move - WASD, Arrow Keys, Left Stick, D-Pad

Drop all monsters - Space, Gamepad South Button (A on Xbox, X on PlayStation, B on Nintendo)

Post-Jam Changelog

V1.1 - fixed bug where going back into a gate after failing it would result in a second failure
